body:
JustAnotherSearch
=================
# Hello
I'm glad to present my education project "JustAnotherSearch".
It an example how you can use low lewel android search API.

Features:
* Local search on device
* Search in all standard search sources
* Search in custom search sources which not need som extra permissions

You can download latest release [here](https://github.com/downloads/mkwork/JustAnotherSearch/another-search-latest.apk)
name: Justanothersearch
